description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Mark of the Web security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-30050):

1. Download and apply the respective updates based on your operating system version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.

**Details**:
- For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5037771: [Download here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771).
- For Windows 11 Version 22H2, apply KB5037771: [Download here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771).
- For Windows 11 Version 21H2, apply KB5037770: [Download here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770).
- For Windows 10 (x64-based and 32-bit), apply KB5037788: [Download here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788).
- For Windows 10 Version 22H2, apply KB5037768: [Download here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a version of Windows compatible with the specified updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of any updates.
